div.p: The MedicationDispense and MedicationDispenseDeclined profiles represent the positive and negative statements for a medication dispensing event. To ensure instances retrieved meet negative intent, applications should check the status element as illustrated in this example:
The following example illustrates the use of the MedicationNotDispensed profile:

pre.code: define "Dementia Medications Not Dispensed": ["MedicationDispense": "Dementia Medications"] MedicationDispense where MedicationDispense.status = 'declined'

tr.td: Opthalmic Antihistamines not indicated; indicates that none of the drugs in the given not done value set were dispensed.
Alcaftadine 2.5 MG/ML Opthalmic Solution not indicated; indicates that the specific drug was not dispensed.

div.p: For a more complete discussion of representation of negation within QICore and quality improvement artifacts, see the Negation in QI Core topic.
